common.city_validation_2: City maximum length should be 30 character

common.state_validation_2: State maximum length should be 30 character

common.country_validation_2: Country maximum length should be 30 character

doctor.zoom_step1: Step 1 : Sign up or Sign in here :
doctor.zoom_step2: Step 2 : Click/Hover on Develop button at the right in navigation bar and click on build app
doctor.zoom_step3: Step 3 : Choose your app type to JWT
doctor.zoom_step4: Step 4 : Fill the mandatory information and In the App credentials tag you can see API key and API Secret.
doctor.zoom_step5: Step 5 : Copy and Paste API key and API secret here and click on save button and you are ready to go.
doctor.change_time_will_effect: Changing timeslot will effect the booked appointment.
doctor.doc_fee_validation_1: Doctor's fees must be greater then zero
doctor.doc_fee_validation_2: Doctor's fees must be between 0 to 1000000000000000000
doctor.doc_fee_validation_3: Doctor's fees Minimum fees and maximum fees are required
doctor.doc_fee_validation_4: Doctor's fees Minimum fees and maximum fees must be greater then zero
doctor.doc_fee_validation_5: Doctor's to fees minimum value must be greater then from fees value.
doctor.doc_fee_validation_6: Doctor's fees Maximum fees and minimum fees must be between 0 to 1000000000000000000

pro_setting.twilio_step_1: Step 1 :  You can sign up for a free Twilio trial account here
pro_setting.twilio_step_2: Step 2 : To get the Twilio CLI connected to your account. Visit
pro_setting.unique_sid: and you’ll find your unique Account SID and Auth Token to provide to the CLI.
pro_setting.twilio_step_3: Step 3: Copy and Paste ACCOUNT SID  and AUTH TOKEN and click on save button and here you go.
pro_setting.twilio_step_4: Step 4 (Optional) : To get your first Twilio phone number for sending sms. Visit
pro_setting.head_on_console: head on over to the console
pro_setting.phone_msg_sid: and you will get phone number to send SMS if you dont want any particular number to send message use your SID
